subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The right-hander Woody Williams was released Saturday by the Houston Astros, and he said he planned to retire. Williams, 41, signed a two-year, $12.5 million contract with the Astros before last season. Williams was 132-116 with a 4.19 earned run average in a 15-year career that included stops in Toronto, St. Louis and San Diego.
